Well there are troves of books in Japanese such as the rekishi Gunzo series,
also Gakken publishers had a series on Japanese Castles of which Osaka jo is
still available. These books give detailed info, charts, graphs , maps , CG
recreations, pix, on every aspect of Japanese castles, but they are in
Japanese. There is nothing comparable to these available in English. as for
what's available on line sorry I can't help there, hopefully someone else
has info.
